headline: The Hartford Announces Appointment Of A. Morris ‘Mo’ Tooker As Company President
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., January 09, 2025--The Hartford appointed Tooker as the company’s president. In this new role, he will add Personal Lines to his current position overseeing Small Commercial, Middle & Large Commercial and Global Specialty, as well as Enterprise Sales & Distribution and Risk Services. This will align all of the company’s property-and-casualty businesses under his leadership. In addition, Tooker will also be responsible for stewarding a number of enterprise-wide initiatives.
